verbs.description: [ARG1: Stocks] [V: fell] [ARG2: sharply] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump 's latest threat to China increased fears of an impending trade war between the world 's largest economies] .
Stocks fell sharply on Tuesday after [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's latest threat to China] [V: increased] [ARG1: fears of an impending trade war between the world 's largest economies] .
